description.value:
Your mastery of disguises has made you adept at spotting impostors.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.VY40amXS8nx7pTRY]{Change form} species trait or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise} 5 ranks

Benefit: When you attempt a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} check to pierce a creature’s disguise, you reduce any bonus it gains from any special ability it used to disguise itself (such as the +10 bonus to Disguise checks granted by @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{disguise self} or the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.JMGvYx1IGzViptHx]{change shape} ability) by 5 or by an amount equal to your ranks in Disguise, whichever is greater. This can’t reduce the bonus granted by any of these abilities to less than 0.
